pages.text: Once a ritual has been begun on a Pyre, the Pyre will begin looking for the same ingredients (or similar where the ore dictionary is used) in inventories below it. If found, these will be inserted into the Pyre.$(br2)At the end of a ritual, if the Pyre contains the items to repeat itself, the fire does not go out but starts anew, consuming the items.

pages.name: Chest Location
pages.text: Any inventory will suffice, be it vanilla or modded.

In addition to consuming items, the Pyre will also attempt to consume nearby fire in order to light itself.$(br2)Given the correct ingredients, the decay of nearby fire will be hastened and the ritual will be started.$(br2)Fire can be placed anywhere in a 3x3x3 cube around the Pyre, as demonstrated in the following visualisation.$(br2)$(warning) Currently only vanilla fire is supported.

pages.name: Fire Locations
pages.text: All positions of bars & grass are places the Pyre will look for fire.
